errors.rootNotFound: Error: Root element not found. Cannot render application.

settings.title: Settings
settings.generalDescription: Network, fee priority, explorer, currency, language
settings.transactionPriorityDescription: Set default fee level for transactions
settings.displayCurrencyDescription: Set preferred fiat currency (e.g., USD, EUR)
settings.autoLockTimerDescription: Set wallet to lock after inactivity

currencySettings.description: Select your preferred currency for displaying fiat values.

languageSettings.description: Select your preferred language for the interface.

transactionSummary.simulationErrorDefault: This transaction would likely fail if submitted.
transactionSummary.noDirectChanges: No direct changes to your asset balances (other than network fee).
transactionSummary.baseFeeTooltip: Standard fee based on the number of signatures required by the transaction.
transactionSummary.priorityFeeTooltip: Optional fee to help prioritize your transaction on the network. Estimated for 'medium' priority.
transactionSummary.estComputeLimitTooltip: The compute unit limit that will be requested for this transaction to accommodate the estimated priority fee.
transactionSummary.estComputePriceTooltip: The price per compute unit (in micro-lamports) for the estimated priority fee.
transactionSummary.rawTxCUsConsumedTooltip: Compute units consumed by the transaction in simulation (without explicit priority fee instructions).

warning.irreversible: This action is irreversible and will permanently delete ALL wallet data (keys, accounts, settings) stored in this extension.
warning.ensureBackup: Ensure you have a backup of your Secret Recovery Phrase(s) if you wish to restore your accounts later.

confirmationApp.unlockToApproveRequest: To approve the request from <1>{{dappName}}</1>, please enter your password.
confirmationApp.viewOnlyCannotSign: The selected account <1>{{accountName}} ({{accountKey}}...)</1> is view-only and cannot be used for signing operations.
confirmationApp.selectDifferentAccountOrReject: Please select a different account or reject the request.
confirmationApp.noOtherAccountsForAction: You do not have any other accounts that can perform this action.
confirmationApp.operationCancelledViewOnly: Operation cancelled due to view-only account.
confirmationApp.connectAllowApp: This will allow the application to:
confirmationApp.connectRequestApproval: Request approval for transactions (if this account can sign).
confirmationApp.noDirectAssetChanges: No direct changes to your assets
confirmationApp.simulationDataUnavailable: Simulation data not available. Raw transaction data will be signed.
confirmationApp.messageSigningInfo: You are signing a message. Ensure you trust the requesting site and understand the message's content and purpose.
confirmationApp.transactionApprovalCautionMessage: Review transactions carefully. Approving a malicious transaction could lead to loss of funds.
confirmationApp.userRejectedAfterError: Popup closed by user after error.

errors.requiredDataNotFound: Required data not found for request ID {{requestId}}.
errors.sessionDataKeyMissing: Session data key missing for signing operation.
errors.messageDataUnavailable: Message data not available or malformed.
errors.cannotApproveBatchSimFailed: Cannot approve: One or more transaction simulations failed. {{error}}
errors.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. You can close this window.
errors.simulationFailedUnknown: Transaction simulation failed due to an unknown reason.

confirmationApp.simulationFailedRecommendNotProceed: This transaction would likely fail if submitted to the network. It's not recommended to proceed.

addViewOnlyAccount.title: Add View-Only Account
addViewOnlyAccount.description: Enter the Solana address (public key) to watch.

fundedAccountSelector.title: Import Accounts
fundedAccountSelector.descriptionWithFunds: Select the accounts derived from your phrase you wish to import.
fundedAccountSelector.descriptionWithoutFunds: No accounts with balance found. You can import the default account.

importOptions.title: Import Existing Wallet
importOptions.tagline: Securely bring your wallet into Kyoku in seconds.

seedPhrase.label: Import with Secret Recovery Phrase
seedPhrase.description: Use your 12- or 24-word secret recovery phrase.

privateKey.label: Import with Private Key
privateKey.description: Manually import your Solana private key.

viewOnly.label: Import as View-Only Wallet
viewOnly.description: Track a public address without full access.

generateMnemonicPrompt.descriptionLine1: This wallet was likely set up with a private key, which doesn't allow creating new accounts.
generateMnemonicPrompt.descriptionLine2: To enable creating multiple accounts, you need to add a primary recovery phrase.

importPrivateKey.title: Import Private Key
importPrivateKey.description: Paste your private key (Base58, Hex, or Byte Array).

display.title: Your Secret Recovery Phrase
display.description: Save this securely! It's the only way to recover your wallet.

confirm.title: Confirm Recovery Phrase
confirm.description: Enter the phrase you saved to verify.

importantWarning.title: Important!
importantWarning.message: Write down and store these words securely. Never share them with anyone.

mnemonicSetup.confirmSaveCheckboxLabel: I understand that if I lose my recovery phrase, I will not be able to access my wallet.

errors.generationFailed: Could not generate recovery phrase. Please refresh.
errors.copyFailed: Failed to copy phrase to clipboard.
errors.confirmSaveRequired: Please confirm you have securely saved your recovery phrase.
errors.pasteFailed: Could not read from clipboard. Please paste manually.
errors.invalidWordCount: Invalid phrase: Expected 12 or 24 words, found {{count}}.
errors.invalidPhrase: Invalid recovery phrase. Please check your words and try again.
errors.phraseMismatch: Phrase does not match the one generated. Please re-enter carefully.

onboardingApp.importSuccessfulMessage: The selected account(s) have been added.

errors.verifyStatusFailed: Could not verify wallet status. Please refresh.
errors.stateLost: Setup process state lost or invalid. Please restart the process.
errors.cannotInitWithViewOnly: Cannot initialize a new wallet with a view-only account.

receiveView.warningMessage: Only send SOL or Solana-based tokens (SPL) to this address on the Solana network. Sending other assets may result in permanent loss.
receiveView.noActiveAccount: No active account selected to receive funds. Please select an account first.

errors.copyFailed: Failed to copy address to clipboard.

errors.verifyStatusFailed: Could not verify wallet status. Ensure the extension is enabled and try reloading.
errors.walletNotFoundGoToOnboarding: Wallet not found. Please go to onboarding.html to set up your wallet.
errors.walletNotFoundOpenManually: Wallet not found. Please open onboarding.html manually.
errors.invalidStatusResponse: Received invalid status from background. Wallet may not be set up.
errors.resetCompleteGoToSetup: Reset complete. Please go to onboarding.html to set up your wallet.

resetWallet.warningConfirm: WARNING: This will permanently delete ALL wallet data (keys, accounts) stored in this extension. This action cannot be undone. Are you absolutely sure?
resetWallet.finalConfirm: FINAL CONFIRMATION: Please confirm you want to reset the wallet. All data will be lost.
resetWallet.successAlert: Wallet reset successfully. Redirecting to setup.
resetWallet.manualSetupAlert: Reset complete. Please manually open the extension again for setup.

burnConfirmationModal.title: Confirm Burn {{itemType}}
burnConfirmationModal.aboutToBurn: You are about to permanently burn:
burnConfirmationModal.irreversibleAction: This action is irreversible. Once burned, the {{itemType}} cannot be recovered.
burnConfirmationModal.rentRecoveryToken: Burning this token will also attempt to close its associated token account, which may return some SOL rent to your wallet.
burnConfirmationModal.permanentActionNft: Burning this NFT is permanent. Ensure you understand this action.

itemList.noTokensToDisplay: You currently have no tokens to display.

showPrivateKeyModal.title: Show Private Key
showPrivateKeyModal.warning: Warning: Never share your private key. Anyone with it can access your funds.
showPrivateKeyModal.storeKeySecurely: Store this key securely. Do not lose it. Do not share it.

showSeedPhraseModal.title: Show Recovery Phrase
showSeedPhraseModal.warning: Warning: Never share your recovery phrase. Anyone with it can access all accounts derived from it.
showSeedPhraseModal.storePhraseSecurely: Store this phrase securely. Do not lose it. Do not share it.

errors.fetchFailed: Failed to fetch full token details.

individualManagementInfo.withoutSpam: Individually manage visibility for tokens (excluding spam/unknown tokens).

changePassword.successMessage: Password changed successfully! Wallet will lock.

explorerSettings.description: Choose your preferred block explorer. Links to transactions and addresses will use this selection.
explorerSettings.saveFailedMessage: Failed to save preference. Please try again.

feeSettings.description: Choose a default priority for your transactions. This helps determine how quickly your transactions are processed, especially during network congestion. You may be able to override this on a per-transaction basis in some cases.

auto.label: Automatic (Recommended)
auto.description: Wallet attempts to set an optimal fee based on network conditions (defaults to Medium).

low.label: Low
low.description: Lower fee, potentially slower confirmation times.

medium.label: Medium
medium.description: Balanced fee for reasonable confirmation times.

high.label: High
high.description: Higher fee for faster confirmation, useful during congestion.

addressBook.emptyStateLine2: Click the '+' button to add an address.

errors.noBackgroundResponse: No response from background for initial state.
